Does it still happen in M6?

Thank you

I'm not able to reproduce the problem in I20040113.
(I didn't had the problem in M6 because I was using a patched M6 that contained a 
workaround for other shutdown problems).

ApplicationRunner and friends have been completely refactored since this bug 
was reported.  To date we are unable to reproduce.  closing but will reopen if 
the problem surfaces again.
